statements: SELECT * FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_name, recyclability FROM packaging_materials WHERE environmental_impact_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials WHERE recyclability = TRUE;
SELECT material_name, environmental_impact_rating FROM packaging_materials ORDER BY environmental_impact_rating DESC;
SELECT material_name, environmental_impact_rating FROM packaging_materials WHERE recyclability = FALSE ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, environmental_impact_rating FROM packaging_materials WHERE recyclability = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials WHERE environmental_impact_rating > 3 ORDER BY environmental_impact_rating ASC;
SELECT material_name, recyclability FROM packaging_materials WHERE material_name LIKE 'P%' AND environmental_impact_rating < 2;
SELECT material_name, environmental_impact_rating, recyclability FROM packaging_materials WHERE recyclability = TRUE ORDER BY environmental_impact_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials
SELECT material_name, recyclable, compostable FROM packaging_materials
SELECT material_id, biodegradable FROM packaging_materials WHERE biodegradable = TRUE
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact WHERE carbon_footprint > 0.5
SELECT material_name, water_usage FROM packaging_materials JOIN environmental_impact USING (material_id)
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials WHERE recyclable = TRUE;
SELECT material_name, biodegradable FROM packaging_materials WHERE compostable = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact WHERE carbon_footprint > 50 AND water_usage < 100;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;

SELECT packaging_materials.material_name, environmental_impact.carbon_footprint FROM packaging_materials INNER JOIN environmental_impact ON packaging_materials.material_id = environmental_impact.material_id;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_name, carbon_footprint FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_id, impact_description FROM packaging_impact;
SELECT material_name, recycling_code FROM packaging_materials WHERE carbon_footprint > 0.5;
SELECT alternative_name, alternative_score FROM sustainable_alternatives;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, carbon_footprint FROM packaging_materials WHERE carbon_footprint > 0.5;
SELECT packaging_materials.material_name, packaging_impact.impact_description FROM packaging_materials JOIN packaging_impact ON packaging_materials.material_id = packaging_impact.material_id;
SELECT alternative_name, alternative_score FROM sustainable_alternatives WHERE alternative_score >= 3 ORDER BY alternative_score DESC;

SELECT packaging_materials.material_name, COUNT(*) AS total_impacts FROM packaging_materials JOIN packaging_impact ON packaging_materials.material_id = packaging_impact.material_id GROUP BY packaging_materials.material_name ORDER BY total_impacts DESC;
SELECT * FROM PackagingMaterials;
SELECT material_name, recyclability FROM PackagingMaterials ORDER BY recyclability ASC;
SELECT manufacturer_name, location FROM PackagingManufacturers WHERE location='USA';
SELECT product_name, production_date, expiration_date FROM FoodProducts WHERE production_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT packaging_material_id, carbon_footprint_metric FROM EnvironmentalImpactData ORDER BY carbon_footprint_metric DESC;
SELECT * FROM FoodProducts WHERE expiration_date > '2022-05-01' ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name, location FROM FoodProducts JOIN PackagingManufacturers ON FoodProducts.manufacturer_id = PackagingManufacturers.manufacturer_id;
SELECT packaging_material_id, material_name, recyclability, environmental_impact_score FROM PackagingMaterials WHERE environmental_impact_score > 5 ORDER BY environmental_impact_score ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT manufacturer_name FROM PackagingManufacturers WHERE location LIKE '%USA%';
SELECT data_id, packaging_material_id, recycling_rate, carbon_footprint_metric FROM EnvironmentalImpactData WHERE recycling_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM food_packaging_materials;
SELECT material_name, impact_rating FROM food_packaging_materials ORDER BY impact_rating DESC;
SELECT manufacturer_name FROM packaging_manufacturers WHERE country='USA';
SELECT * FROM sustainable_alternatives WHERE cost_per_unit < 1.5;
SELECT type_name, recyclable FROM packaging_types WHERE recyclable = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM food_packaging_materials WHERE impact_rating > 3;
SELECT manufacturer_name, country FROM packaging_manufacturers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT type_name, recyclable FROM packaging_types WHERE recyclable = TRUE ORDER BY type_name ASC;
SELECT alternative_name, cost_per_unit FROM sustainable_alternatives WHERE cost_per_unit < 1.5 ORDER BY cost_per_unit DESC;
SELECT material_name, impact_rating FROM food_packaging_materials JOIN environmental_impact_data ON food_packaging_materials.id = environmental_impact_data.material_id;
